scripts.starting:
echo "\x1b[91mHello thank you for contributing

You can contribute by literally just testing the app

It helps A lot

Again, thank you for contributing!

\x1b[0m"&& cd client && npm i && cd .. && cd users && npm i
scripts.start:
echo "\x1b[91mDon't forget to do npm stop.

Your code will not update.

If you edited the code!

Thank you for contributing!

\x1b[0m" && cd development && docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml up
scripts.build:
echo "\x1b[91mBuilding and running the environment!

Don't forget to do npm stop.

Your code will not update.

If you edited the code!

\x1b[0m" && cd development && docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml up --build
scripts.clean:
echo "\x1b[91mTHIS SCRIPT DELETES EVERYTHING STORED IN THE DEVELOPMENT DATABASE



\x1b[0m" && docker system prune && echo "\x1b[91mDELETING ALL DANGLING VOLUMES



\x1b[0m" && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -qf dangling=true)
